在阿尔卑斯群山中，马特峰(The Matterhorn)既非最高，也非最险，却凭着完美的山形赢得了全世界的青睐。因为没与其他山峰相邻， …

means.word_mean: 1. a mountain in the Alps on the border between Switzerland and Italy (14,780 feet high); noted for its distinctive shape
